text: Micropholis compta is a species of plant in the family Sapotaceae. The plant is endemic to the Atlantic Forest ecoregion in southeastern Brazil. It is an IUCN Red List Vulnerable species. ==References== compta Category:Endemic flora of Brazil Category:Flora of Atlantic Forest (biome) Category:Trees of Brazil Category:Vulnerable flora of South America Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Micropholis compta
